23616701.description:
This room has a private bathroom.

Please note that extra beds are not available for this room type.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of all ages are welcome.
Children 3 and above are considered adults at this property.
To make sure you pay the correct price when traveling with children under 3, select a rate that has a child occupancy specified.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: The price in EUR has been converted to show you the approximate price in USD.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cribs, extra beds, and children allowed in existing beds can vary depending on the option booked.
All cribs and extra beds are subject to availability.

23616705.description:
- top floor of the hotel, with magnificent views of the historic center of Prague, including Prague Castle.
- built-in kitchen, a dining room, a work area with Internet connection and a living room with plasma TV, satellite and DVD player
- 3 separate bedrooms, a walk-in closet, storage space for luggage and 2 bathrooms, one of which includes a washing machine, the other with a bathtub and shower unit.
- fully air-conditioned, with a safe, and an elevator directly to the apartment
